Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #152 Addison buses

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
